channel.title: Tau Radius on Life Reboot
channel.description: Recent content in Tau Radius on Life Reboot

item.title: Ivan Hawkes
item.description: I developed an interest in computers starting in the early 1980’s leading me to learn how to write software in BASIC for the 6502 architecture. Soon after I learnt assembler in order to push the hardware to the speeds I wanted. It was games that drove my interest. A local corner store had a Space Invaders machine, and I had dropped far more 20 cent pieces into that machine than I had to spare.
